statements: SELECT * FROM ContentScheduling WHERE publication_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT * FROM ContentScheduling WHERE content_id = 3;
SELECT publication_time FROM ContentScheduling WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT publication_date, publication_time FROM ContentScheduling WHERE content_id = 5;
SELECT content_id, publication_date FROM ContentScheduling WHERE publication_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM ContentScheduling ORDER BY publication_date ASC, publication_time DESC
SELECT content_id, publication_time FROM ContentScheduling WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT publication_date, publication_time FROM ContentScheduling WHERE content_id = 1 ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT publication_date, publication_time FROM ContentScheduling WHERE publication_time > '12:00:00'
SELECT content_id, publication_date, publication_time FROM ContentScheduling ORDER BY publication_date DESC, publication_time ASC
SELECT * FROM content_scheduling;
SELECT content_id, publication_date FROM content_scheduling WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_id, content_title, author FROM content_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT content_id, category FROM content_metadata WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT content_id, author, publication_date FROM content_metadata JOIN content_scheduling ON content_metadata.content_id = content_scheduling.content_id;
SELECT * FROM content_scheduling WHERE publication_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT content_id, publication_date FROM content_scheduling ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT content_title, category FROM content_metadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM content_scheduling WHERE content_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT author, content_title FROM content_metadata WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_schedule;
SELECT category_name FROM content_categories;
SELECT author_name, email_address FROM content_authors;
SELECT id, publication_date, publication_time FROM content_schedule ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, author_name FROM content_authors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM content_schedule ORDER BY publication_date DESC, publication_time ASC;
SELECT id, category_name FROM content_categories WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY category_name;
SELECT cs.id, ca.author_name, cc.category_name FROM content_schedule cs JOIN content_authors ca ON cs.id = ca.id JOIN content_categories cc ON cs.id = cc.id WHERE ca.email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication_date, MIN(publication_date) AS oldest_publication_date FROM content_schedule;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_content FROM content_schedule cs JOIN content_categories cc ON cs.id = cc.id GROUP BY cc.category_name ORDER BY total_content DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_scheduling ORDER BY publication_date DESC, publication_time ASC
SELECT content_title, publication_date FROM content_scheduling WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM content_categories WHERE category_name = 'Tech'
SELECT author_name, email FROM content_authors WHERE id = 3
SELECT tag_name FROM content_tags
SELECT content_title, publication_date FROM content_scheduling WHERE publication_date = '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM content_authors ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT id, category_name FROM content_categories WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT author_name, email FROM content_authors WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT content_title, publication_date, publication_time FROM content_scheduling WHERE publication_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY publication_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_schedule ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT content_text, scheduled_time FROM content_schedule WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM content_tags WHERE tag_name = 'Technology';
SELECT content_id, publication_date FROM content_schedule WHERE content_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM content_publishers ORDER BY publisher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM content_schedule LIMIT 5;
SELECT content_text, publication_date FROM content_schedule WHERE content_id = 3;
SELECT cs.content_text, ct.tag_name, ca.author_name FROM content_schedule cs JOIN content_tags ct ON cs.content_id = ct.tag_id JOIN content_authors ca ON cs.content_id = ca.author_id;

SELECT cs.content_text, cc.category_name, cp.publisher_name FROM content_schedule cs JOIN content_categories cc ON cs.content_id = cc.category_id JOIN content_publishers cp ON cs.content_id = cp.publisher_id;
SELECT * FROM content_schedule WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
